p: A large array of climate mitigation scenarios, explored by integrated assessment models, illustrate the extent of the efforts required to mitigate climate change and the implications of those efforts for other sustainability indicators (Popp et al., 2017). Generally, more ambitious and coordinated transformations involving food and land use systems will be necessary to achieve the various Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in a concerted manner (Schmidt-Traub et al., 2019).
